title: PaPiPuPe Poniko!
description:
To commemorate Ponycon X (10), the author has made corrections to the past Japony manga and is now in higher resolution. 

Japan Ponycon is an exchange event for fans of the cartoon "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic."
This is a story about Poniko, the mascot character and her friends.

Original Author:
https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/1418095
https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/1418095
https://www.deviantart.com/yukina-namagaki

Go ahead and support him
author: Namagaki Yukina
